summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies flags that, when used in a bitwise OR operation, describe the contents of each channel of an audio stream in a karaoke title.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_CONTENTS.DVD_Karaoke_GuideMelodyA
member.summary: The channel contains guide melody A.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_CONTENTS.DVD_Karaoke_GuideMelodyB
member.summary: The channel contains guide melody B.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_CONTENTS.DVD_Karaoke_SoundEffectA
member.summary: The channel contains sound effect A.

member.name: DVD_KARAOKE_CONTENTS.DVD_Karaoke_SoundEffectB
member.summary: The channel contains sound effect B.
